entry.title: [GRA6/8][Virtual Private Servers] - Network maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 30, 20:00 UTC  -  Oct 1, 04:00 UTC

Sep 17, 21:25 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect Latency.

Start time : 30/09/2024 20:00 UTC
End time : 01/10/2024 04:00 UTC
Service impact : None. Except in rare case latencies may be noted to reach PCI instances running
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out a network hardware upgrade in our Graveline Datacenters.

The operation is carried out in several steps:

- Step 1: Preparation of the operation (about 3 hours)
- Step 2: New hardware implementation (about 2 hours)
- Step 3: Test and activation of the new hardware (about 2 hours)

The critical phase of this upgrade is tentatively scheduled between 10:30 PM UTC and 12:00 AM UTC. We are not expecting any impact. However in case of an issue the rollback can be managed in less than 30 minutes.
